sentences.en: Automatically Tommy's hand went to his forehead.
sentences.cn: 汤米不由自主地用手去摸额头。

sentences.en: Business success does not automatically lead to financial success.
Husbands and wives of British nationals do not automatically gain citizenship.
sentences.cn: 英国公民的配偶不能自动取得公民身分.

sentences.en: It is worth remembering that previous wills are nullified automatically upon marriage.
sentences.cn: 要记住的是，一旦结婚，原遗嘱自动失效。

sentences.en: Many loan application forms automatically add on insurance.
sentences.cn: 许多贷款申请表自动附加保险。

sentences.en: Merely because you believe a thing is right, it isn't automatically so.
sentences.cn: 事情不会仅仅因为你相信它是对的，就会必然如此。

sentences.en: Of course I automatically said yes.
sentences.cn: 当然，我脱口而出说是的。

sentences.en: Once people retire they automatically cease to be union members.
sentences.cn: 人们一旦退休就自动不再是工会会员.

sentences.en: She had automatically labelled the boys as troublemakers.
sentences.cn: 她不假思索地认定这些男孩子是捣蛋鬼.

sentences.en: The device automatically disconnects the ignition when the engine is switched off.
sentences.cn: 当引擎关掉时，这个装置会自动切断点火开关。

sentences.en: The doors opened automatically as we approached.
sentences.cn: 我们走近时，门自动开了。

sentences.en: The machine automatically downloads the required information to his or her fax.
sentences.cn: 机器能自动将需要的信息下载到传真机上。
这台机器自动循环运转.

sentences.en: The oven burners reignite automatically if blown out.
sentences.cn: 烤炉的火如果吹灭了会自动再点燃。

sentences.en: The transmitters will send a signal automatically to a local base station.
sentences.cn: 发射台会自动将信号发射到地方基站。

sentences.en: Your current account is automatically debited with the amount of your purchase.
sentences.cn: 你购物的金额会自动记入账戶借方.
